Package game.Settings

Class FilesInterface

java.lang.Object
game.Settings.FilesInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public abstract class FilesInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
Abstract class for the save and load menus, which consist of an identical layout. Implements ActionListener for buttons to function

      public void loadContent()
      Method to load the contents of the three save files. These contents are then assigned to variables in this class and referenced by the GUI-creating methods

      Method used to modify what is displayed if a file is empty
      Parameters:
      s - , icon - s is the String that would be used by the label displaying the file name, icon is the JButton that can have its icon changed

      public javax.swing.JButton getFile​(int f)
